GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v4.14.296
GSD.description:
memory: of: Fix refcount leak bug in of_get_ddr_timings()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.296 by commit a4f7eb83852a65b6f8dea7dcc42b7c76d4d9b0a3, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit e6b42eb6a66c188642aeb447312938c6f6ebee86. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: of: Fix refcount leak bug in of_get_ddr_timings()
